lessons.name: German Alphabet and Pronunciation
lessons.description: Learn the German alphabet, including umlauts and the "ß", and basic pronunciation rules.

lessons.name: Greetings and Introductions in German
lessons.description: Learn formal and informal greetings and how to introduce yourself and others in German.

lessons.name: Numbers, Colors, and Days of the Week in German
lessons.description: Essential vocabulary: numbers, colors, days of the week, and months in German.

lessons.name: Basic German Grammar: Nouns and Articles
lessons.description: Introduction to German nouns, genders (der, die, das), and articles (definite and indefinite).

lessons.name: The Verb "Sein" (To Be) in Present Tense
lessons.description: Learn the conjugation of the verb "sein" (to be) in the present tense and basic uses.

lessons.name: Personal Pronouns and Basic Sentence Structure
lessons.description: Learn German personal pronouns and how to form simple sentences in German (subject-verb-object).

lessons.name: Basic Questions in German
lessons.description: Learn how to ask basic questions in German using question words (Wer, Was, Wo, Wann, Warum, Wie).

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Family and Home in German
lessons.description: Expand your vocabulary with words related to family members and parts of the home in German.

lessons.name: Simple Imperatives in German
lessons.description: Learn how to give simple commands and instructions in German using the imperative form.

lessons.name: Beginner German Level Review
lessons.description: Review of all topics covered in the beginner German level.

lessons.name: Review of Beginner and Expanded Greetings/Farewells
lessons.description: Review beginner concepts and learn more diverse greetings, farewells, and polite phrases in German.

lessons.name: Regular Verb Conjugation in Present Tense
lessons.description: Learn the conjugation patterns of regular German verbs in the present tense.

lessons.name: Accusative Case: Direct Objects
lessons.description: Introduction to the accusative case and how it affects articles and pronouns for direct objects.

lessons.name: Dative Case: Indirect Objects
lessons.description: Introduction to the dative case and how it affects articles and pronouns for indirect objects.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Food and Drink in German
lessons.description: Expand your vocabulary related to food and drinks, and learn how to order in a restaurant in German.

lessons.name: Modal Verbs: "Können" and "Müssen" (Can/Must)
lessons.description: Introduction to the modal verbs "können" (can) and "müssen" (must) and their uses.

lessons.name: Prepositions of Place with Dative and Accusative
lessons.description: Learn prepositions of place and when to use the dative or accusative case with them.

lessons.name: Describing People in German
lessons.description: Learn vocabulary to describe people's appearance and basic personality traits in German.

lessons.name: Past Tense: "Perfekt" with "Haben"
lessons.description: Introduction to the "Perfekt" (present perfect) tense using the auxiliary verb "haben".

lessons.name: Elementary German Level Review
lessons.description: Review of all topics covered in the elementary German level.

lessons.name: Review of Elementary and Daily Routines in German
lessons.description: Review elementary concepts and learn vocabulary to talk about daily routines and schedules in German.

lessons.name: Irregular Verb Conjugation in Present Tense
lessons.description: Learn the conjugation patterns of common irregular German verbs in the present tense.

lessons.name: Genitive Case: Possession
lessons.description: Introduction to the genitive case and how it indicates possession in German.

lessons.name: Two-Way Prepositions (Wechselpräpositionen)
lessons.description: Learn two-way prepositions and understand when to use the dative or accusative case with them based on motion or location.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Hobbies and Free Time Activities in German
lessons.description: Expand your vocabulary related to hobbies and leisure activities in German.

lessons.name: Modal Verbs: "Wollen" and "Sollen" (Want/Should)
lessons.description: Introduction to the modal verbs "wollen" (want) and "sollen" (should) and their uses.

lessons.name: Past Tense: "Perfekt" with "Sein"
lessons.description: Learn the "Perfekt" (present perfect) tense using the auxiliary verb "sein" for verbs of motion and change of state.

lessons.name: Comparative and Superlative Adjectives
lessons.description: Learn how to form and use comparative and superlative adjectives in German to compare things.

lessons.name: Asking for and Giving Directions in German
lessons.description: Practice asking for and giving directions in German using appropriate vocabulary and phrases.

lessons.name: Pre-intermediate German Level Review
lessons.description: Review of all topics covered in the pre-intermediate German level.

lessons.name: Review of Pre-intermediate and Thematic Vocabulary Expansion
lessons.description: Review pre-intermediate concepts and expand thematic vocabulary in various areas of daily life in German.

lessons.name: Past Tense: "Präteritum" (Simple Past)
lessons.description: Introduction to the "Präteritum" (simple past) tense and its usage, especially for "sein" and "haben" and modal verbs.

lessons.name: Relative Clauses in Nominative and Accusative
lessons.description: Learn how to form relative clauses in the nominative and accusative cases to provide more information.

lessons.name: Future Tense: "Futur I"
lessons.description: Introduction to the "Futur I" (future tense) and how to express future actions and plans in German.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Travel and Accommodation in German (Advanced)
lessons.description: Expand and refine your vocabulary related to travel, accommodation, and booking arrangements in German.

lessons.name: Modal Verbs in Past Tense ("Präteritum")
lessons.description: Learn how to use modal verbs in the "Präteritum" (simple past) tense to express past abilities, obligations, etc.

lessons.name: Adjective Endings: All Cases and Genders
lessons.description: Master adjective endings in all four cases (nominative, accusative, dative, genitive) and for all genders and noun types.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Work and Study in German
lessons.description: Expand your vocabulary related to work environments, professions, and academic studies in German.

lessons.name: "Wenn" and "Falls" Clauses (Conditional Sentences)
lessons.description: Introduction to conditional sentences using "wenn" and "falls" (if) and their structure in German.

lessons.name: Intermediate German Level Review
lessons.description: Review of all topics covered in the intermediate German level.

lessons.name: Review of Intermediate and Complex Grammar Structures
lessons.description: Review intermediate concepts and introduce more complex grammatical structures and sentence constructions in German.

lessons.name: Relative Clauses in Dative and Genitive
lessons.description: Learn how to form relative clauses in the dative and genitive cases for more complex sentence structures.

lessons.name: Passive Voice in Present and Past Tense
lessons.description: Learn how to use the passive voice (Passiv) in both present and past tenses in German.

lessons.name: Subjunctive Mood II (Konjunktiv II): Hypothetical Situations
lessons.description: Introduction to the Subjunctive Mood II (Konjunktiv II) for expressing hypothetical situations and polite requests.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Business and Finance in German (Advanced)
lessons.description: Expand and refine your vocabulary related to business, finance, and economics in German for professional contexts.

lessons.name: "Damit" and "Um...zu" Clauses (Purpose Clauses)
lessons.description: Learn how to form purpose clauses using "damit" and "um...zu" to express the purpose of an action.

lessons.name: Prepositions with Genitive Case
lessons.description: Learn common prepositions that always take the genitive case and practice their usage.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Technology and Innovation in German (Advanced)
lessons.description: Expand and refine your vocabulary related to technology, innovation, and digital topics in German.

lessons.name: Reported Speech (Indirect Speech) in German
lessons.description: Learn how to use reported speech (indirect speech - Indirekte Rede) to report what others have said in German.

lessons.name: Upper-intermediate German Level Review
lessons.description: Review of all topics covered in the upper-intermediate German level.

lessons.name: Review of Upper-intermediate and Formal German
lessons.description: Review upper-intermediate concepts and focus on formal German language usage, including register and style.

lessons.name: Subjunctive Mood I (Konjunktiv I): Indirect Speech in Detail
lessons.description: Deepen your understanding of Subjunctive Mood I (Konjunktiv I) and its specific use in indirect speech.

lessons.name: Noun-Verb-Verbindungen (Noun-Verb Collocations)
lessons.description: Learn common and important noun-verb collocations (Noun-Verb-Verbindungen) to enhance fluency and natural German expression.

lessons.name: "Obwohl", "Trotzdem", "Dennoch" (Contrast Connectors)
lessons.description: Master the use of advanced connectors like "obwohl," "trotzdem," and "dennoch" (although, nevertheless) to express contrast.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Current Events and Global Issues in German (Advanced)
lessons.description: Expand and refine your vocabulary for discussing current events, global issues, and political topics in German.

lessons.name: "Indirekte Fragen" (Indirect Questions)
lessons.description: Learn how to formulate indirect questions (Indirekte Fragen) for a more polite and formal style of asking questions.

lessons.name: Sentence Adverbs and Modal Particles
lessons.description: Introduction to sentence adverbs (Satzadverbien) and modal particles (Modalpartikeln) and their subtle effects on meaning.

lessons.name: Vocabulary: Academic and Professional Writing in German
lessons.description: Develop specialized vocabulary for academic and professional writing in German, including essay and report writing.

lessons.name: German Idioms and Figurative Language
lessons.description: Explore and learn common German idioms and figurative language to understand and use more nuanced and idiomatic German.

lessons.name: Advanced German Level Review
lessons.description: Review of all topics covered in the advanced German level.

lessons.name: Review of Advanced and Linguistic Refinement in German
lessons.description: Review advanced concepts and focus on linguistic refinement, precision, and stylistic nuance in German.

lessons.name: German Phonetics and Advanced Pronunciation Practice
lessons.description: Deepen your understanding of German phonetics and practice advanced pronunciation, including regional variations.

lessons.name: Advanced German Text Analysis and Interpretation
lessons.description: Develop advanced skills in German text analysis and interpretation of complex literary and academic texts.

lessons.name: German for Specific Professional Purposes (Business, Legal, Medical)
lessons.description: Explore specialized German vocabulary and communication styles for specific professional fields (business, legal, medical).

lessons.name: German Cultural Studies and Intercultural Communication
lessons.description: Study aspects of German culture, history, and society and develop intercultural communication competence.

lessons.name: Creative Writing and Stylistics in German
lessons.description: Engage in creative writing exercises and explore German stylistics to enhance personal expression in German.

lessons.name: Advanced German Listening Comprehension: Authentic Materials
lessons.description: Improve advanced listening comprehension skills using authentic German materials (news, podcasts, lectures, films).

lessons.name: German Rhetoric and Presentation Skills (Advanced)
lessons.description: Refine German rhetoric and presentation skills for persuasive and effective communication in formal settings.

lessons.name: Translation and Interpretation German-English (Advanced)
lessons.description: Develop advanced translation and interpretation skills between German and English with complex texts and contexts.

lessons.name: Proficiency German Level Final Review and Assessment
lessons.description: Final review of all aspects of the proficiency German level and comprehensive assessment.
